articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: ICC Seeking Guarantee From PCB Over ODI World Cup Participation Amid Asia Cup Saga: Report - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The development comes after PCB chief Najam Sethi made it clear that the team will not travel for the World Cup in India if the Rohit Sharma-led side doesn't visit Pakistan for the preceding Asia Cup.
articles.content: The International Cricket Council (ICC) chairman and CEO are in Lahore to seek guarantees from the PCB that it will not push for implementing a hybrid model for its matches in the ODI World Cup in In… [+2216 chars]
